title: Cannot amend feature names in shap interaction summary plot
body:
Hello, 

I would like to get the correct (meaningful) feature names into my Shap summary plot with `shap_interaction_values` for all the model features, rather than generic (numeric, generic) feature names (e.g. Feature 1, Feature 2, etc.). 

This problem exists even though I get the correct (meaningful) feature names in all my other shap plots, including the generic summary plot based on `X_test`.

I generate shap values this way: 
```
shap_exp = shap.Explainer(xgb_model, feature_names=feature_names)
train_shap_vals = shap_exp(X_train) 
test_shap_vals = shap_exp(X_test)
shap_interaction_values = shap_exp.shap_interaction_values(X_test)
```

I get the correct (meaningful) feature names when I run: 
`shap_exp.data_feature_names`

But when I run the following, I get incorrect (numbered) feature names (e.g. Feature 1, Feature 2, etc.):
`shap.summary_plot(shap_interaction_values) `

When I run the following code, I get the subsequent error: 
`shap.summary_plot(shap_interaction_values, feature_names = feature_names)`
`Only integer scalar arrays can be converted to a scalar index`

I have tried to change the 'column' names of the `shap_interaction_values` ndarray. I have also tried replacing the numeric feature names (e.g. Feature 1, Feature 2, etc.) with correct, meaningful ones via `np,where()` and `np.select()`.  Although the code runs, these changes do not then come through to the summary plot of the `shap_interaction_values`.

When I look through Git Hub, as well as other Shap blogs and discussions, I have not found others to share this issue. Challenges around the shap_vals do not apply because correct (meaningful) feature names have emerged for me with plots for those values. There seems to be a problem with the generation of my `shap_interaction_values` and then the mapping of correct (meaningful) feature names onto my shap interaction values during the `summary_plot()` command. 

I would be grateful for some advice, if you can help me to get the correct (meaningful) feature names into my Shap summary plot with `shap_interaction_values` for all the model features, rather than generic (numeric, generic) feature names (e.g. Feature 1, Feature 2, etc.). 

Thank you for your kind attention.
